ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage Mk.I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a DSU (Deep Storage Unit) which holds a large amount of items. -Holds 1000 of an item.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage Mk.II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build an upgraded DSU (Deep Storage Unit) which can hold more items. -Holds 1500 of an item.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage Mk.III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build an even deeper DSU (Deep Storage Unit) which can hold even more items. -Holds 2250 of an item.
